an4.49:4.1: * “Cattārome, bhikkhave, saññāvipallāsā cittavipallāsā diṭṭhivipallāsā.
an4.49:4.3: Anicce, bhikkhave, niccanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso;
an4.49:4.4: dukkhe, bhikkhave, sukhanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso;
an4.49:4.5: anattani, bhikkhave, attāti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso;
an4.49:4.6: asubhe, bhikkhave, subhanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.
an4.49:4.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro saññāvipallāsā cittavipallāsā diṭṭhivipallāsā.
an4.49:5.3: Anicce, bhikkhave, aniccanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso;
an4.49:5.4: dukkhe, bhikkhave, dukkhanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso;
an4.49:5.5: anattani, bhikkhave, anattāti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso;
an4.49:5.6: asubhe, bhikkhave, asubhanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
an4.49:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro nasaññāvipallāsā nacittavipallāsā nadiṭṭhivipallāsāti.
an4.49:6.1: * Anicce niccasaññino,
an4.49:8.3: Te imaṃ dhammaṃ pakāsenti,
